en: He benefited first from a tontine.
He brought the couscous and ate quickly.

ngiemboon: Lelÿò penkʉ́ tè jÿó ffo ndẅe wɔ́.
en: Most children do not take the bitter medicine.

ngiemboon: Lelÿò penkʉ́ tè jÿó ffo gie á ne ńdẅete wɔ́.
en: Most children do not take remedies that are slightly bitter.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńgyá má ɔ̀, tè lẅɛ́ lé mèŋ.
en: If you see your mother, don't brag to me.
